Before building Syncope, you need to setup an environment variable to give Maven more memory.

- On Unix + On Unix with JDK 7 export MAVEN_OPTS="-Xms512m -Xmx1024m -XX:PermSize=256m -XX:MaxPermSize=512m"

- On Windows + On Unix with JDK 8 or later + export MAVEN_OPTS="-Xms512m -Xmx1024m" +

+

+ On Windows with JDK 7 set MAVEN_OPTS=-Xms512m -Xmx1024m -XX:PermSize=256m -XX:MaxPermSize=512m

+

+ On Windows with JDK 8 or later + set MAVEN_OPTS=-Xms512m -Xmx1024m +
